app: 海康威视iSecure Center综合安防管理平台
seo: 海康威视, iSecure Center, 任意文件上传, 综合安防管理平台
seo_en: Hikvision, iSecure Center, Arbitrary File Upload, Integrated Security Management Platform
summary: 检测海康威视iSecure Center综合安防管理平台是否存在任意文件上传漏洞，通过上传恶意文件和验证响应来确认漏洞存在。
summary_en: Detect arbitrary file upload vulnerabilities in Hikvision iSecure Center Integrated Security Management Platform by uploading malicious files and verifying the response.
